body_html:
Looks like the init is sometimes performed first and sometimes the assign.

I don't know if this is a bug, but one could argue that you are expected to init all variables with a separate sess.run call before performing any operations.
On the other hand could sess.run always perform init operations first. I don't know if it would be hard to check for this

body:
Looks like the init is sometimes performed first and sometimes the assign.

I don't know if this is a bug, but one could argue that you are expected to init all variables with a separate sess.run call before performing any operations. 
On the other hand could sess.run always perform init operations first. I don't know if it would be hard to check for this
